replies.body: Have you opened a support ticket and sent them the logs?
Hey man, relax and take a deep breath. It's just a game, and everything will be alright.

Yikes! I can certainly feel your passion about this, and trust I'm gonna look over as much of this as I can to see just exactly what was going wrong and what I could possibly do to help bud.

That last post sounds like my poro-bro was trying to help you figure out why you were having issues joining that game to begin with. He started out with the [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues), but that's not to say there's a problem with your pc itself. Sometimes your internet is running 100% but it can still have problems reaching specific servers in some cases. 

I want to make sure that the issue with you not being able to join the game is taken care of first, so make sure that you run through the steps in that guide. Also, if you can find the network logs for that match, go ahead and pop them into this [**log reader**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743) so we can check for packet loss at the same time.

After you troubleshoot that weird connection issue, go ahead and shoot us a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). Once we've been able to make sure you're able to join games normally again we can open up the discussion of what can be done about that low-priority queue.
